participant_1.background:
I cherish my camera because it allows me to express my creativity.
i am a classicly trained chef.
i play bass.
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.

participant_2.background:
I need a home that is close to a music venue and has a large backyard for my boys to play in.
I have a tattoo on my back that they don't know about.
I cook cheap but delicious food that my friends love and use my apple devices to keep my life organized.
i like to cook breakfast on sundays.
i enjoy john gresham movies , but not his books.

content.text: I'm good, just got back from a hike with my family.
That's awesome! I love hiking. Did you guys go to a nice spot?
Yeah we went to a local nature preserve. It was beautiful.
That sounds amazing. I'm so glad you had a good time.
Thanks! So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, play music, and spend time with my family.
Wow, we have a lot in common! I love to cook too. What kind of food do you like to make?
I love to make all kinds of food, but my favorite is classic Italian.
Me too! I love to make pasta.
That's awesome! I make a mean lasagna.
Oh my gosh, I love lasagna! Do you have a recipe you can share?
Sure! Here's the link to my recipe: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/216989/classic-lasagna/.
Thanks! I'll definitely have to try that.
You're welcome! I hope you like it.
I'm sure I will. Thanks again for sharing it with me.
